meanings.sent1: The vegetarian burger is made with nonmeat ingredients.

meanings.sent3: The nonmeat pizza had a surprising amount of flavor.

meanings.definition: Not consisting of or derived from meat.
meanings.sent1: The salad dressing is a delicious nonmeat option.
meanings.sent2: They enjoyed the nonmeat lasagna at the party.
meanings.sent3: The nonmeat sandwich was a hit with the kids.
meanings.sent4: Her nonmeat cooking skills impressed everyone at the potluck.
meanings.sent5: The nonmeat stir-fry was a colorful and tasty dish.

meanings.definition: Not related to or involving meat.
meanings.sent1: The restaurant offers a variety of nonmeat dishes.
meanings.sent2: He follows a nonmeat lifestyle for ethical reasons.
meanings.sent3: The nonmeat event was a fun and unique experience.
